source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Learn Photorealism: Create a Maldive Island in Blender 2.8
items.headline: Step by Step Course to Teach You How to Achieve Photorealism in Blender 2.8
objectives_summary: You will Learn to create a Realistic Maldive Island scene from scratch
You will Learn Camera Mapping and Scale Matching using fSpy
You will Learn Fluid Simulation by creating a Realistic Beach Simulation

items.title: Explosion, using particles in Houdini
items.headline: Particle explosion, Pyro simulation
objectives_summary: How to create explosions in Pyro
Use particles as a source for explosions inside v.17
Create multiple explosions, using wedge

items.title: Create a Crystal and Stones in Cinema 4D
items.headline: Step-by-step Training Course for Modeling Stones and a Crystal in Cinema 4D
objectives_summary: Modeling in Cinema 4D

items.title: Total Architectural visualization/booth designs with Blender
items.headline: Use blender 2.8 or a later version to create amazing visualizations for booths and exhibition designs
objectives_summary: 3d modelling and visualizations of booths and exhibitions
Learn to Create Photo Realistic 3d Renders with blender
Learn How To Create 3d Products Required for Booth and Exhibition Designs

items.title: mangAnimeおひさま塾: Learn Manga Drawing from Japanese Animator ①

visible_instructors.name: Kimiharu
visible_instructors.job_title: Animator, Lecturer of amps, Rep. Director of Pioneer Prod.
visible_instructors.title: Kimiharu Obata

items.headline: How to draw Manga & Anime Character Figure with Posture and create a storytelling scene by Kimiharu Obata (小幡公春)
objectives_summary: Fundamental Drawing Skill
Japanese Manga and Anime Drawing
Basics of drawing the Bodies of Manga & Anime characters

items.title: Blender 2.8 Stylised 3D Game Model Complete Beginners Guide
items.headline: 3D Model a Medieval Cannon with Blender 2.8, Zbrush, Substance Painter & Marmoset Toolbag 3
objectives_summary: Using Blender 2.83 and understanding its interface and shortcuts
Sculpting a stylised 3D game asset in Zbrush
Substance Painter: explore and have fun with texturing and material creation

items.title: 2D Character Animation: Dialogue and Acting
items.headline: Animate a character for lip sync and acting: character animation in Adobe Animate
objectives_summary: You'll learn animation techniques to bring a character to life!
You'll learn how to add a dialogue track
How to create mouth shapes

items.title: Create a Sci Fi wormhole animation in Blender
items.headline: Have you always wanted to create a cool wormhole animation in blender? Then, this is the course for you.
objectives_summary: create awesome wormholes in blender
apply the knowledge learned to other projects
Animate objects and values

items.title: The Complete Substance Painter Course: Create 3DGun texture
items.headline: Master 3D Texturing & Modeling With Maya & Substance Painter. Learn With A Gun Model Example.
objectives_summary: Use Maya and understand it's interface
Understand the principles of modelling
Understand the principles of texturing

items.title: Blender 3D Crash Course for Absolute Beginners
items.headline: Learn to Create Custom 3D Models, Images & Animations Using FREE Software!
objectives_summary: Use Blender to Create Awesome 3D Art - Still images & Animations!
Model Custom 3D objects from Scratch!
Apply Custom Materials & Image Textures to Your 3D Models

items.title: Learn to Rig a Complex Quadruped in Maya for Games and Film

visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!
visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC

items.headline: Everything you need to know to understand rigging a complex, 4-legged character for games!
objectives_summary: Create IK/FK rig systems in Maya
Understand rigging Spline IK systems
Learn to deal with the unique challenges of rigging a quadruped character or creature

items.title: Blender 2.8 for beginners - Sword creation
items.headline: Discover a complete workflow to build game assets with last Blender's version
objectives_summary: Discover last Blender's version new features
Build an asset ready to import for game engines
Learn a complete workflow with Blender ( modeling, sculpting, texturing , baking )

items.title: 3D ANIMATION 0 to PRO : Create Credible & Unique Animations
items.headline: The Basics + Basic & Advanced Body mechanics + Pantomime + Create unique personalities + Blender Guide.
objectives_summary: The principles of 3D Animation.
The "Basics" of animation with step-by-step demonstrations
How to make physically credible animations (Body Mechanics + Advanced body mechanics)

items.title: 2D Character Design in Blender
items.headline: Using Blender, we will go through the process or creating and rigging a 2D character.
objectives_summary: Have a 2D character that they can use in projects such as animated short films

items.title: CINEMA 4D Unleashed - Master 3D Fundamentals
items.headline: Unleash the power of CINEMA 4D to Create 3D Models, Animations, 3D Text and Hollywood looking Video Intros
objectives_summary: In this course, You will learn basic 3D Video & Animation techniques.
Learn how to use Cinemea 4D to create 3D Titles & Objects in your videos

items.title: Learn Maya 2017 for Game Development

visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!
visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC

items.headline: Learn the basics of one of the industry's most powerful 3d modeling and animation softwares for games and film!
objectives_summary: Navigate through the Maya UI and core interface features
Use polygonal modeling and UV mapping for games with Maya
Use and understand Maya character rigging and animation tools
